index.title: Knowledge Base
index.subtitle: Explore Monero's knowledge base: books, encyclopedic entries, and research papers.

library.title: Library
library.cardSubtitle: Books, publications, magazines, and educational materials curated by the community.
library.subtitle: Explore publications, books, and educational resources curated by the Monero community. Whether you're just starting out or diving deep into cryptography, there's something here for you.

books.title: Books
books.subtitle: In-depth guides and technical resources to help you understand Monero from the ground up.

salmonSeries.title: The Salmon Series
salmonSeries.description: Infographics dealing with Monero's inner workings. The name comes from the employed colors, having semantic meanings and resembling salmon browning - from raw to well-done.

newsletters.title: Newsletters
newsletters.subtitle: Stay updated with the latest Monero news, developments, and community highlights.

moneropedia.title: Moneropedia
moneropedia.cardSubtitle: A comprehensive encyclopedia of Monero terminology, concepts, and technical explanations.
moneropedia.subtitle: Comprehensive glossary of Monero and blockchain terms.

researchLab.title: Research Lab
researchLab.cardSubtitle: Academic papers, cryptographic research, and protocol improvements from the Monero Research Lab.
researchLab.subtitle: Monero is committed to continued research into financial privacy as it involves cryptocurrencies. Below you'll find work from our researchers, with more papers to come.

hero.title: Advancing privacy in cryptocurrency
hero.description: The Monero Research Lab (MRL) is an open, collaborative team of researchers working on cutting-edge cryptography and privacy technologies. Our work focuses on improving Monero's protocol, analyzing potential vulnerabilities, and advancing the state of financial privacy research.

papers.title: Research Papers
papers.subtitle: Papers written by MRL members on cryptography, privacy, and protocol improvements.

whitepapers.title: Cryptonote Whitepapers
whitepapers.subtitle: Foundational documents describing the protocol Monero is built upon.
